channel.title: How come i hosted server it says error connection?
channel.description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------- OMG WRONG SECTION IAM SORRY BUT CAN U STILL HELP ME?PLEASE?| -------------------------------------------------------------------- i dont get it it doesnt work? i try to put the ip i did and it doenst allow me this is all i have and did:)
2: i can play on my server thats good. 3: I putted exceptions one is (1smtps1 port: 43594 tcp) and other one is (1smtps1 port: 43594 udp) 4: I got no ip and downloaded it looks like this [img]http://img112.imageshack.us/img112/4761/1gpsmyserverom1.png[/img] 5: and i portforwarded it looks like this [img]http://img232.imageshack.us/img232/6666/2gpsmyserverqb6.png[/img] 6: and my server is running cause i can play it .but how is other people gonna play? when the ip i hosted at no-ip doesnt work man
i will be really thankfull if someone helps me and i get out of this problem :D ;D [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2008, 09:40:07 AM[/size][hr]no one even helps omg :mad: :(

item.title: How come i hosted server it says error connection?

OMG WRONG SECTION IAM SORRY BUT CAN U STILL HELP ME?PLEASE?
